interpretation: The "sun behind cloud" card represents a temporary setback or delay in progress. It suggests that although the ultimate outcome may be positive, there are currently obstacles in the way. This card encourages patience and perseverance, reminding us that even on cloudy days, the sun is still shining behind the scenes. It may also indicate a need to be flexible and adapt to changing circumstances. Associated keywords include: delay, setback, obstacle, patience, perseverance, adaptability.
